expired.title: Your results have expired
expired.message: For your privacy, screening results are not kept for long. Let's start a new screening to find the benefits your family may qualify for.

overview.title: Your Benefit Recommendations
overview.subtitle: Based on what you shared about your family, here are the programs that may help.
overview.encouragement: Navigating these programs is hard â€” you are not the only family working through this. You do not have to figure everything out today, and you do not have to do it alone. Start with what feels most important to your family right now.

programs.unlikelyTitle: Other Programs (based on your answers, these may not apply)
programs.unlikelyNote: Your situation may change, or you might have additional needs that qualify you for these programs. Click a program to learn more.

documents.title: Documents You'll Need
documents.subtitle: Gather these documents to speed up your applications.

whatIf.title: What If My Income Changes?
whatIf.subtitle: Use the slider to explore how changes in your household income might affect which programs you qualify for.
whatIf.noChange: At this income level, your program eligibility would likely stay the same.
whatIf.moveSlider: Move the slider to see how income changes could affect your eligibility.
whatIf.disclaimer: This is an estimate only. Actual eligibility depends on many factors beyond income. Contact each program for specific details.
